  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ciclación de la fructosa</string>
            <string language="en">Cyclisation of fructose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zyklisierung des Fruchtzuckers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cyclisation de fructose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cyclisation do fructose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclizzazione di fruttosio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cyclisation της φρουκτόζης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir cómo se cicla la fructosa, cómo se llaman los enlaces de ciclación y qué aspecto tiene la molécula de fructosa cuando está ciclada.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover how fructose cyclises, what the cyclisation binding sites are called and what the fructose molecule looks like when it is cyclised.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fructosa</string>
            <string language="en">fructose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in denen der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß wie Fruchtzucker cyclises, was die verbindlichen Sites der 
Zyklisierung benannt werden und was das Fruchtzuckermolekül aussieht 
wie, wann es ist, cyclised.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir comment des cyclises de fructose, ce que les accepteurs de 
cyclisation s'appellent et ce que la molécule de fructose ressemble 
à le moment où elle est cyclised.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir como
cyclises do fructose, o que os locais obrigatórios do cyclisation 
são chamados e o que a molécula do fructose olha como quando é 
cyclised.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire come 
cyclises del fruttosio, che cosa i luoghi obbligatori di ciclizzazione
sono chiamati e che cosa la molecola del fruttosio assomiglia a quando
è cyclised.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
πώς φρουκτόζη cyclises, τι οι cyclisation περιοχές 
συσχετισμών καλούνται και τι το μόριο φρουκτόζης μοιάζει με πότε
είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fruchtzucker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fructose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fructose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fruttosio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φρουκτόζη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
